ygData.subject: RE: Stein
ygData.msgSnippet: The more important ingredients are Lore items so you won t be accidentally selling them. Paul Bernat            | Power Technologies, Ltd. Phone: +44 1565
ygData.messageBody:
The more "important" ingredients are Lore items so you won't be accidentally
selling them.

Paul Bernat | Power Technologies, Ltd.
Phone: +44 1565 650388 | Cranford Court,
Fax: +44 1565 750376 | King St, Knutsford
http://www.pti-us.com | Cheshire, UK WA16 8BW

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Daniel Devorkin [mailto:devo@...]
> Sent: 17 August 1999 18:05
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Stein
>
>
> From: "Daniel Devorkin" <devo@...>
>
> what are the ingredients that are needed so i dont accidentally sell them?
>
>
>
> > From: Nosferatu <nosferatu@...>
> >
> >
> >
> > Jason Cent wrote:
> > >
> > > From: Jason Cent <jcent@...>
> > >
> > > You still didn't answer my question, fellas....
> > >
> > > if it's LORE ITEM then what do you do with the Stein
> you already
> > > have? give it to someone to hold?
> >
> > Generally (with the three I have done (1 was a friend, other 2 people
> > who wanted me to do it for a fee)) I trade them the stein, they give me
> > the fee, plus the 4 ingredients (I am not going to run all over north
> > for just a bit of cash)
> > >
> > > Also, is the Book NO DROP or just LORE? I forget....
> > >
> > > I'd like to complete this quest again to sell
> one....I need the
> cash
> > > badly to work on my jewelry some more...I spent over 200pp last night
> and
> > > went from 43 to 48 in Jewelry. ouch!! that hurts!!
> > >
> >
> > /Nosferatu
